issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

The height of a search bar cannot be changed if added to a tableview on the droid platform through the search property. This is ok for medium density devices but on high density devices the search bar looks very tiny by default and since the height can not be changed it's an eye sore. You'll notice on the first tab the search bar is tiny, second tab it looks ok (not added added to tableview), third tab its still tiny even though we try to change the height.

Helpdesk ticket:

http://developer.appcelerator.com/helpdesk/view/72301#c342141

{html}
fields.summary: Android: Searchbar hight incorrect when set as search property for a tableview.

comments.body: Closing issue due to time passed and irrelevance of the ticket.
